meanings.definition: People who have a net worth of several million dollars.
meanings.sent1: Many multimillionaires invest in real estate to grow their wealth.
meanings.sent2: The multimillionaires in the city are known for their philanthropic efforts.
meanings.sent3: The multimillionaires decided to have a friendly competition to see who could save the most money.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, multimillionaires are the kings and queens of the market.
meanings.sent5: The image of multimillionaires living in luxury mansions is often portrayed in movies.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who possess assets totaling in the millions.
meanings.sent1: The company's board meeting was attended by multimillionaires from various industries.
meanings.sent2: During the charity event, multimillionaires generously donated to support the cause.
meanings.sent3: The multimillionaires gathered for a yacht party to celebrate their successful investments.
meanings.sent4: In the exclusive club, multimillionaires shared tips on managing their vast fortunes.
meanings.sent5: The annual gala was a glamorous affair with multimillionaires showcasing their opulent lifestyles.
